aircraft.value: Eagle Vision-9 - AC-8196-604 at Sector South Station

defect_observed.value: Canopy seal deterioration. Abnormality observed during system test.

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Wing Structure component. Inspection revealed damage to critical components.

corrective_action.value: Revise maintenance procedure to include additional verification steps

preventive_action.value: Introduce protective coating to prevent environmental degradation

remarks_investigation.value: Investigation completed as per established procedures. All findings documented.

remarks_design.value: Detailed analysis indicates design margins are adequate. Failure attributed to operational factors. Concur with findings. Date: 21/05/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Sqn Ldr H.S. Bhatia

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality aspects reviewed. Manufacturing process controls are adequate. Recommend supplier quality audit. Date: 23/05/2024 Signature: Wg Cdr M.S. Reddy

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) User perspective considered. Recommend update to operating procedures based on lessons learned. Date: 24/05/2024 Signature: Gp Capt N.R. Kumar

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality assurance framework assessed. Investigation process followed established protocols. Findings are valid. Date: 24/05/2024 Signature: Gp Capt V.S. Pillai

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Airworthiness implications assessed. Recommend issuance of technical directive for fleet-wide compliance. Date: 29/05/2024 Signature: Air Cmde R.K. Joshi

Centre for Military Airworthiness and Certification
FORM - 44
DEFECT INVESTIGATION REPORT FORMAT
Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Major
b) Defect Observed: Canopy seal deterioration. Abnormality observed during system test.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Age-related degradation of elastomeric components
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Wing Structure component. Inspection
revealed damage to critical components.
c) Remedial Measures Revise maintenance procedure to include additional verification steps
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Introduce protective coating to prevent environmental degradation
d) Attributable Code: F - Failure/ageing/Corrosion/Material Failure
